grads¶

class grads.polychrom_eigen_psf(data, supp, neighbors_graph, weights_neighbors, spectrums, A, flux, sig, ker, ker_rot, D, data_type=<type 'float'>)[source]¶

Polychromatic eigen PSFs class

This class defines the operators for a field of undersampled space varying polychromatic PSFs. These operators are related to the eigen PSFs estimation.

data : np.ndarray
Input data array, a array of 2D observed images (i.e. with noise)

The properties of GradBasic and PowerMethod are inherited in this class

Calls:

  • psf_learning_utils.transport_plan_projections_field()
  • psf_learning_utils.transport_plan_projections_field_transpose()
MX(x)[source]¶

This method calculates the action of the matrix M on the data X

x : np.ndarray
Input data array, a cube of transportation plans

np.ndarray result

MtX(x)[source]¶

This method calculates the action of the transpose of the matrix Mt on the data X

x : np.ndarray
Input data array, a cube of 2D images

np.ndarray result

cost(x, y=None, verbose=False)[source]¶

Compute data fidelity term. y is unused (it’s just so modopt.opt.algorithms.Condat can feed the dual variable.)

get_grad(x)[source]¶

Get the gradient step This method calculates the gradient step from the input data Parameters ———- x : np.ndarray

Input data array

np.ndarray gradient value Notes —– Calculates M^T (MX - Y)

class grads.polychrom_eigen_psf_coeff(data, supp, neighbors_graph, weights_neighbors, spectrums, P, flux, sig, ker, ker_rot, D, data_type=<type 'float'>)[source]¶

Polychromatic eigen PSFs class

This class defines the operators for a field of undersampled space varying polychromatic PSFs. These operators are related to the estimation of weights, when there is no spatial constraints.

data : np.ndarray
Input data array, a array of 2D observed images (i.e. with noise)

The properties of GradBasic and PowerMethod are inherited in this class

Calls:

  • psf_learning_utils.transport_plan_projections_field()
  • psf_learning_utils.transport_plan_projections_field_coeff_transpose()

class grads.polychrom_eigen_psf_coeff_graph(data, supp, neighbors_graph, weights_neighbors, spectrums, P, flux, sig, ker, ker_rot, D, basis, data_type=<type 'float'>)[source]¶

Polychromatic eigen PSFs class

This class defines the operators for a field of undersampled space varying polychromatic PSFs. These operators are related to the estimation of weights, when the graph constraint is activated (i.e. weights are further factorized by the spatial constraints matrix).

data : np.ndarray
Input data array, a array of 2D observed images (i.e. with noise)

The properties of GradBasic and PowerMethod are inherited in this class

Calls:

  • psf_learning_utils.transport_plan_projections_field()
  • psf_learning_utils.transport_plan_projections_field_coeff_transpose()
